src:
Sulitnya Jadi Starter di Liverpool
01 Nov 2019, 15:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah pengakuan diungkapkan Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain. Gelandang Liverpool itu mengakui bahwa ada kualitas yang sangat besar dalam timnya musim ini, sehingga tidak mudah baginya untuk menjadi starter.
Chamberlain sendiri perlahan tapi pasti mulai terlibat di skuat Liverpool. Ia kembali mendapatkan jam bermain setelah pulih dari cedera lutut parah yang menimpa dirinya.
Tengah pekan kemarin, ia menjadi starter saat Liverpool berhadapan dengan Arsenal. Di laga tersebut ia membuat satu gol saat timnya mengalahkan tim asal London Utara itu dengan skor 5-5 melalui babak adu penalti.
Chamberlain mengakui bahwa saat ini performanya masih belum 100% pulih sehingga ia ingin meningkatkan permainannya. "Jika saya boleh jujur, saya tidak terlalu senang dengan kualitas permainan saya saat ini," beber Chamberlain kepada Sportsmole.

Baca komentar lengkap sang gelandang di bawah ini.
text:
Difficult to Become a Starter at Liverpool
Nov 1 2019, 15:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A confession was revealed by Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain. The Liverpool midfielder admits that there is a huge quality in his team this season, so it is not easy for him to be a starter.
Chamberlain himself slowly but surely began to get involved in the Liverpool squad. He returned to playing hours after recovering from a severe knee injury that had befallen him.
In the middle of last week, he became a starter when Liverpool faced with Arsenal. In that match he made one goal when his team defeated the North London team with a score of 5-5 through the shootout round.
Chamberlain admitted that at the moment his performance is still not 100% recovered so he wants to improve his game. "If I may be honest, I am not very happy with the quality of my game at the moment," Chamberlain told Sportsmole.

Read the midfielder's full comments below.
